channel.title: Make a separator that use the other belt only when the first is full
channel.description:
is it possible to create a separator tha make the item go on a second belt only when the main one is full
and an inteligent separator with a new output that only work for the selected item output is full to not stop the incomming that can help to make the one belt stokage system work without one ressources block any other

item.title: Make a separator that use the other belt only when the first is full
item.dc:creator: @zoscran Zoscran
item.description:
@zoscran wrote:

hooo thx for that info i didn’t know it can work like that

Read full topic
item.source: Make a separator that use the other belt only when the first is full

item.title: Make a separator that use the other belt only when the first is full
item.dc:creator: @Joseph_C Joseph C
item.description:
@Joseph_C wrote:

I’ve been using Advanced Logistics for that first part, with an adjustable splitter, set your main exit to 1 and your overflow to 0, and set them to send to each other when full.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a separator that use the other belt only when the first is full
